bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, w/ concentric BB, fully butted, tapered headtube, forged BB30 BB shell, forged sliding dropouts w/ integrated chain tensioners, 85mm travel, includes both geared and single speed drop outs, BB30, MID BB and threaded BB shells

components.description: Fox Racing Shox Factory Series Float CTD, Boost Valve, Kashima coating w/ SV air sleeve – Velocity Tune firm, rebound tune medium, alloy shaft, 200mmx50mm
Zero stack press-in 1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower threadless, Campy style, full cartridge bearings, hydraulic gryo-compatible
Collar, single and multispeed hardware, owner's manual
